text: The Bayer designations d Velorum and D Velorum are distinct. Due to technical limitations, both designations link here. For the star : * d Velorum, see HD 74772 (HR 3477) * D Velorum, see HD 74753 (HR 3476) == See also == * δ Velorum (Delta Velorum) Category:Vela (constellation) Velorum, d
title: D Velorum
